span.span: The exception that is thrown when a potentially malicious input string is received from the client as part of the request data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 约束和验证用户输入是在 Web 应用程序以阻止黑客攻击，依赖于恶意输入字符串中必不可少。Constraining and validating user input is essential in a Web application to prevent hacker attacks that rely on malicious input strings. 跨站点脚本攻击是此类攻击的一个示例。Cross-site scripting attacks are one example of such hacks. 通过各种形式的输入，可以在请求中传递其他类型的恶意或不需要的数据。Other types of malicious or undesired data can be passed in a request through various forms of input. 通过限制的低级别的应用程序中传递的数据类型，可以防止不需要的事件，即使编程人员使用的你的代码不落实到位，有适当的验证方法。By limiting the kinds of data that is passed at a low level in an application, you can prevent undesirable events, even when programmers who are using your code do not put the proper validation techniques in place. 请求验证检测到潜在的恶意客户端输入并引发此异常来中止处理请求。Request validation detects potentially malicious client input and scripting attack. 强烈建议你的应用程序显式检查所有输入有关请求中止。It is strongly recommended that your application explicitly check all input regarding request aborts.
